amendment.description: Amendment adds veterans service organizations to the list of discretionary members of the Wildlife and Hunting Heritage Conservation Council Advisory Committee.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 113-339 to add veterans service organizations to the list of discretionary members of the Wildlife and Hunting Heritage Conservation Council Advisory Committee. Many organizations, including the VA, include outdoor activities to help wounded veterans in their rehabilitation efforts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
